mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(orderno), '1') FROM orderlist WHERE orderno LIKE #{cdate} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderlist(orderno, id, totalamount, payment, deliverynm, deliveryaddr, ordercheck) VALUES (#{orderno}, #{id}, #{totalamount}, #{payment}, #{deliverynm}, #{deliveryaddr}, 'I')
INSERT INTO orderdetail(ono, orderno, product_code, qty, price) SELECT orderdetail_seq.nextval, #{orderno}, product_code, qty, price, id FROM cart WHERE id=#{s_id}
